frontMatter.title: Badminton at Claremont Stadium Tonight!
frontMatter.summary: Join us tonight at Claremont Stadium for exciting badminton matches with courts open from 8:30pm to 11pm. Don't miss the action!

prev.title: Badminton Club Update
prev.summary: Our badminton club membership is full. Only current members can join Club Nights. Updates will be shared soon.
